name: DISGARD: BATTLEMAGE
description:
THIS IS AN TOP DOWN OPEN WORLD RPG WITH NO LEVEL CAP.

YOU ARE A BATTLEMAGE. YOU ARE ON AN ISLAND IN SEARCH OF A ROGUE MAGE. SEARCH FOR HIM AND DEFEAT HIM WHILE EXPLORING THIS DANGEROUS ISLAND! USE A MAGIC SWORD AND A VARIETY OF SKILLS TO DEFEAT OPPONENTS AND DODGE-ROLL OUT OF HARMS WAY!

ABILITIES

MAGIC BOLT - SHOOTS AN BOLT OF MAGIC! (LOW ENERGY COST, LOW DAMAGE)

FIREBOLT - SHOOTS AN BOLT OF FIRE AND BURNS THE AREA! (MEDIUM ENERGY COST, MEDIUM DAMAGE)

ICE BOLT - SHOOTS AN ICE BOLT THAT SLOWS AND DAMAGES ENEMIES (MEDIUM ENERGY COST, MEDIUM DAMAGE)


POISON BOLT - SHOOTS AN BOLT OF POISON AND POISONS ENEMIES! (HIGH ENERGY COST, HIGH DAMAGE)

FORCE BLAST - A BLAST OF FORCE TO KNOCK ENEMIES BACK! (LOW ENERGY COST, LOW DAMAGE) (LOOKS BETTER IN-GAME WITH EFFECTS)

GOLEM - SUMMON A GOLEM TO DESTROY YOUR FOES! (VERY HIGH ENERGY COST, DOES HIGH DAMAGE)

            

 

HEAL - USE ENERGY TO RESTORE HP! (COSTS 1 ENERGY FOR 1 HEALTH POINT)


MAGIC SWORD - USE A MAGICAL SWORD TO SLICE THROUGH YOUR ENEMIES! (HIGH DAMAGE, HIGH STAMINA AND ENERGY COST)

HOPE YOU GUYS ENJOY IT!
